mapper.select: select db.db_name,t.version,t.name,r.c from dict_type t inner join database_name db on t.db_id = db.uid inner join( select r.dt_id,t.version,count(r.table_id) c from rel_table_type r inner join dict_type t on r.dt_id = t.uid where t.`status` = 1 GROUP BY r.dt_id ) r on r.dt_id = t.uid where t.status = 1 and db.status = 1 order by db.db_name,t.version
